snippet: A 52-27 victory by the Giants over the Saints may be misleading in terms of the defensive lapses the Giants displayed, including giving up five plays of 20 yards or more.
abstract: Sam Borden On Pro Football column contends that the New York Giants 52-27 victory over New Orleans Saints may be misleading in terms of the defensive lapses the team displayed, including giving up five plays of 20 yards or more.
lead_paragraph: A 52-27 victory by the Giants over the Saints may be misleading in terms of the defensive lapses the Giants displayed, including giving up five plays of 20 yards or more.

headline.seo: Giants Blowout of Saints Doesn’t Hide Defensive Lapses
headline.main: Even in a Blowout, Disturbing Signs for the Giants’ Defense
headline.print_headline: Even in a Blowout, Disturbing Signs for the Giants’ Defense
